ai-patthana18.13:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.13:0.3_0: Transmigration with the roots that are associated with roots,
ai-patthana18.13:1.1_0: (They are) not associated with cause or reasons. Please, for the sake of this teaching. Instead, you don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.13:2.1_0: (They are) not associated with cause or reason. Please, for the sake of this teaching. Instead, they don’t give rise to the cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.13:2.1_3: This is the section in brief.
